title: Linda Hamilton lost so much weight before Terminator: Dark Fate they had to 'build her a new butt'
text:
Actress Linda Hamilton appeared on Lorraine on Wednesday to chat about her involvement in the latest Terminator sequel.

The Hollywood star, 63, who has reprised her role as Sarah Connor in Terminator: Dark Fate, revealed that she had become 'chunky' but lost too much weight ahead of filming.

Of the physicality of the role, Linda said: 'There were no carbs in my life for a year. I got so lean, when I arrived they had to build me a butt.

In training: Linda Hamilton revealed that she had become 'chunky' but lost too much weight ahead of filming Terminator: Dark Fate

'They added bottom!' Linda admits she became 'too lean'

'They added bottom, something you don’t ever see coming, who wants more bottom, but apparently… I shouldn’t give my secrets away!

'Time off was military training, Spanish lessons, scuba, we had to do it all. There was never a moment we weren’t learning something or acting.'

She also joked she has been threatening to fake her own death so she wouldn’t have to do another Terminator film, if there is going to be one.

'I've been threatening to fake my own death so I wouldn’t have to do the next one if there is one. It really was hard, it was the hardest and the greatest I’ve ever done,' she said.

Now and then: The Hollywood star, 63, has reprised her role as Sarah Connor [L] in Terminator: Dark Fate [pictured R in Terminator 2: Judgement Day, 1991]

Co-star Mackenzie Davis laughed: 'It was so hard making this god damn movie.'

Of reprising the role and getting it right for fans Linda said: 'I was worried too. I just wanted to let the film have the same impact.

'I didn’t see [the return] coming ever… It never occurred to me that we’d be coming back and that I’d get to do this again.'

And of the women being tougher than Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda laughed: 'Fair enough, it’s about time.'

On working with him again, she said: 'We get to do some really good work together this time rather than just running from him.'

Terminator: Dark Fate is released in the UK on 25 October. ITV’s Lorraine airs weekdays from 8.30AM.
